marklogic.body: A bill with ~2700 pages is ridiculous . . . even the Supreme Court Justices and their staffs don't want to read it . . . . let along rule on every element contained therein. Nancy Pelosi and the democrats who promoted and forced this on the American taxpayer EXPECTED TAXPAYERS to rollover and Cough up the bucks to pay. SHAME ON THEM. AMERICANS wake up and fight to Gain your freedoms back form this outrageous Senate . . . the Senate who has not passed a budget in 3 years.
